html: In the night—When others are sleeping, my thoughts and desires are working towards God. Early—Betimes in the morning. For—And good reason it is that we should thus desire and seek thee in the way of thy judgments, because this is the very design of thy judgments, that men should thereby be awakened to learn and return to their duty; and this is a common effect, that those who have been careless in prosperity, are made wiser and better by afflictions.
